---
fork: Prague
---

## Notes

BLS12-381 G2 addition precompile performs point addition on the G2 group of the BLS12-381 elliptic curve. G2 points are defined over the quadratic extension field Fp2, making them larger and more computationally expensive than G1 points.

The G2 group is used in pairing operations and is essential for BLS signature verification. More information can be found in [EIP-2537](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2537).

## Inputs

| Byte range | Name | Description |
|-----------:|-----:|------------:|
| `[0; 63]` (64 bytes) | x1_c0 | X coordinate c0 component of first point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[64; 127]` (64 bytes) | x1_c1 | X coordinate c1 component of first point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[128; 191]` (64 bytes) | y1_c0 | Y coordinate c0 component of first point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[192; 255]` (64 bytes) | y1_c1 | Y coordinate c1 component of first point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[256; 319]` (64 bytes) | x2_c0 | X coordinate c0 component of second point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[320; 383]` (64 bytes) | x2_c1 | X coordinate c1 component of second point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[384; 447]` (64 bytes) | y2_c0 | Y coordinate c0 component of second point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[448; 511]` (64 bytes) | y2_c1 | Y coordinate c1 component of second point on BLS12-381 G2 |

Input must be exactly **512 bytes**. Points must be valid G2 curve points and in the correct subgroup.

## Output

| Byte range | Name | Description |
|-----------:|-----:|------------:|
| `[0; 63]` (64 bytes) | x_c0 | X coordinate c0 component of result point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[64; 127]` (64 bytes) | x_c1 | X coordinate c1 component of result point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[128; 191]` (64 bytes) | y_c0 | Y coordinate c0 component of result point on BLS12-381 G2 |
| `[192; 255]` (64 bytes) | y_c1 | Y coordinate c1 component of result point on BLS12-381 G2 |


## Example

| Input | Output |
|------:|-------:|
| `` | `` |

## Gas
The gas cost is fixed at 600. However, if the input does not allow to compute a valid result, all the gas sent is consumed.
